LanguageData.AutoStripOnHaul_SettingsDescription:
Your pawns will automatically strip corpses of their weapons, useable equipment (ie: belts, grenades, utility), and smeltable apparel (ie: metallic helmets, armor) upon hauling them.

However, the amount of tainted non-smeltable apparel (ie: tainted cloth/leather t-shirts, hats, pants) that drops can be configured.

This setting is for those who would rather not deal with tons of useless tainted clothes after every battle!
LanguageData.AutoStripOnHaul_NonsmeltableApparelToDro: Maximum Tainted Non-Smeltable Apparel to Drop
LanguageData.AutoStripOnHaul_SettingsDescriptionTwo: Note: At settings lower than "All", tainted non-smeltable apparel over the specified amount will be auto-magically destroyed upon haul.
